creator: gregoire@webjeff.org
text:
Hi,

on win98, i start apache 1.3.20 in ms-dos with the commande : apache.exe
From another ms-dos window, i can stop apache : apache.exe -k stop

With apache2, it doesn' work. Server can't stop. The message is :
"No installed service named "Apache2"".
Sure it isn't as it's said services are experimental on win98.

So how can i stop apache2 from another ms-dos window ?

creator: wrowe@apache.org
text: Believe this to be fixed by 2.0.43  ...  please reopen if I'm mistaken.
